title: In the Bahamas, heavy rain and wind drive residents to shelter.
dc:creator: Jasper Williams-Ward

media:content.media:credit: Zack Wittman for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Robert McCorrison placed sandbags in front of his church in Fort Pierce, Fla., to protect from potential floodwaters as Hurricane Nicole approached Floridaâ€™s east coast on Wednesday.
